info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 15 at 8:32PM PDT until March 15 at 9:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHEASTERN INYO, SOUTHEASTERN NYE AND WESTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 832 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing the heavy rain across the warned area has decreased. However, Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen and runoff continues. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pahrump, Shoshone and Death Valley Junction. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
